notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.
Applies spell immunity for the duration and a basic dispel upon cast.
During Lesser Avatar, the hero cannot be affected by Ghost Scepter. The buff gets removed immediately.
For more details, including a list of spells which are not blocked, see Spell immunity.

name: Minotaur Horn
description: The trophy from a mighty beast ambushed and slain in the recesses of its own home.
